original_text:
Then I was constantly at his side.
I was filled with delight day after day,
    rejoicing always in his presence,
korean_text: 내가 그 곁에 있어서 창조자가 되어 날마다 그의 기뻐하신 바가 되었으며 항상 그 앞에서 즐거워하였으며

sentences.original_text: Then I was constantly at his side.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 나는 항상 그의 곁에 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: I was filled with delight day after day,
